library(DataComputing)

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(lubridate)
page <- "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_nuclear_reactors"
table_nodes <- page %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes("table")
table_list <-
  html_table(table_nodes[1:30], fill = TRUE)

```

```{r}
table = table_list[[24]]
names(table)
```

```{r}
new_names <- c("Name" , "Reactor No.", "Type" , "Model" ,"Status", "Net Capacity in MW", "Gross Capacity in MW", "Construction Start Date", "Commercial Operating Date" , "Closure")
names(table) <- new_names
table <- table[-1, ]
table
```
